list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the curved path of a celestial object or spacecraft around a star, planet, or moon, especially a periodic elliptical revolution.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the Earth's orbit around the sun
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: quỹ đạo của trái đất quanh mặt trời

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a sphere of activity, interest, or application.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a radical filmmaker outside the Hollywood orbit
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một nhà làm phim triệt để bên ngoài quỹ đạo Hollywood

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the cavity in the skull of a vertebrate that contains the eye; the eye socket.
(of a celestial object or spacecraft) move in orbit around (a star or planet).
